scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd client && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
